Pre-Game Insights: Sacramento Kings are playing with more heart and effort under interim coach Doug Christie compared to the previous coach Mike Brown.
Post-Match Reflections: Sacramento Kings' victory was highlighted by coach Doug Christie as a crucial step toward the championship.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat are 4-7 without Jimmy Butler this season.
This was the 100th meeting between the Sacramento Kings and Miami Heat.
